snippet: The authorities in Morgantown, W.Va., are investigating seven street fires set after Saturday’s West Virginia-Baylor game.
abstract: Auburn University football receiver Quan Bray is suspended following his arrest in Georgia during a traffic stop; other news noted.
lead_paragraph: The authorities in Morgantown, W.Va., are investigating seven street fires set after Saturday’s West Virginia-Baylor game.

headline.seo: Police Look Into Fires Set After West Virginia Game
headline.main: Police Look Into Fires Set After West Virginia Game
headline.print_headline: Auburn Receiver to Miss Game on Saturday
